welcome.title: All-Pay blockchain auction. The winner takes the NFT and up to 50% of all stakes
welcome.subtitle: Auction participants return 10% of their bids in GREEDY tokens, which always increase in price
welcome.description: GreedyArt is a decentralized allpay auction where anyone can sell their work or earn money by purchasing it.
welcome.unauth: To create an auction, please connect your wallet.
